Title: The New World
Overview: A drama about explorer John Smith and the clash between Native Americans and English settlers in the 17th century.
Tagline: Once discovered, it was changed forever.
production_companies: New Line Cinema, First Foot Films, Sunflower Productions, Sarah Green Film, The Virginia Company LLC
Cast: Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christopher Plummer
